document_data.name: Inn of the Crooked Staff
document_data.mainbody: The '''Inn of the Crooked Staff''' was an [[inn]] located in the city of [[Almorel]] on the [[Lake of Mists]] in the [[Hordelands]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: The inn was located in the northcentral section of the city near the coast of the Lake of Mists. It sat directly across the street from the [[Raumkreml]] which was the seat of government in Almorel during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The inn was owned by a [[Raumviran]] named [[A. Grekov]].
